plot outline: A good Samaritan Krish is in love with Pooja,Pooja suggests to pose as a boyfriend to her friend Bhoomi so that she could get rid of her marriage commitment as Bhumi wants to complete her education but her father wants her to marry to a local goon.Krish reaches Bhumi's village posing as her boyfriend but situation in village leads to more complications.
title: Vrundavan
plot: The Mr-fix-it Krish decides to help his girlfriends best friend by posing as her boyfriend until he decides to completely fix her family problems and reunite them as a whole.
